subtitle: A deliciously creamy soup that will warm anyone's heart on chilly winter evenings.

method.text: Place the onion, celery, peas and stock in a large bowl or dish. Add seasoning, bay leaf and bouquet garni.
Cover and cook on 100% FULL power for 12-15 min until vegetables are tender.
Remove bay leaf and bouquet garni. Blend the soup in a liquidiser or pass through a sieve. Return to the bowl.
Blend the cornflour with the milk until smooth. Stir into the soup.
Heat on 100% FULL power for 3-4 min until slightly thickened and boiling.
Stir in the cream to give a swirled effect.

title: Celery and pea soup - microwave
